net.floodlightcontroller.devicemanager.normal
Class DeviceMultiIndex

java.lang.Object
  net.floodlightcontroller.devicemanager.normal.DeviceIndex
      net.floodlightcontroller.devicemanager.normal.DeviceMultiIndex

public class DeviceMultiIndex
extends DeviceIndex

An index that maps key fields of an entity to device keys, with multiple device keys allowed per entity
